In my name and on behalf of Egypt, I would like to say thank you for what you have done and what you are doing, and congratulations on your celebration of Engineer Day # President #Day
The march of the Egyptian engineer throughout history has been the march of giving all the events of the homeland peace and war # President # Day_Engineer

The ideas, efforts and projects of the Egyptian engineer Baba of the doors of victory in the glorious military battles and battles of continuous development and the victory of the best witness # President
After the revolution, trade unionism became one of the pillars of democracy and the empowerment of society and its participation in the management of the nation's affairs

Your role in the leadership of change and reconstruction after the revolution is large and influential as it is the development locomotive and the development compass and torch of hope # President # Day_Engineer
Achieving the leadership of Egypt is inseparable from the leadership achieved by the Egyptian engineer at home and abroad and this is the real balance of Egypt # President # Day_Engineer
I strongly support the role and mission of the Egyptian engineer and develop it to be fit for the engineers of Egypt and the civilization of Egypt # President # Day_Engineer
I call on the engineers of Egypt to participate effectively in the fields of energy, development projects, slums, transportation and roads
I invite you to look at the scene in its entirety and comprehension so as not to distract us from the course of construction and to be able to face the obstacles # President # Day_Engineer
As we lift the narrow gains, we will go beyond this transitional period that all nations experienced in the post-revolution phase and Egypt is now passing through.

The responsibility of the state institutions to their responsibilities according to the Constitution and the three powers exercise their role independently and do not interfere to confuse the scene, but complement .. Will be our success and progress
We must manage our natural differences of opinion based on the gains of the Egyptian revolution in resorting to popular will and respect for the rule of law
We proceed to the completion of state institutions in the elections of the House of Representatives after the consensus on the election law and ensure its constitution # President # day_Engineer

Youth Egypt's future ... I congratulate my sons, the heroes of the Egyptian youth team for winning the African Championship and raising the name of Egypt in all international sports forums # President

#HotubaMachi31 Akiwa hapa Rais Jinping ameitangazia dunia sera ya China kwa Afrika ikiwemo nafasi 18,000 za mafunzo kwa vijana wa Afrika.
#HotubaMachi31 Katika ziara ya Rais Jinping serikali zetu zimetia sahihi mikataba 16 ya ushirikiano katika nyanya mbalimbali.
#HotubaMachi31 Tarehe 29 Machi tulipata ajali ya kuporomoka kwa jengo Jijini Dar es Salaam. Ajali hii imeleta msiba na simanzi kubwa.
#HotubaMachi31 Ajali hii ya kuporomoka kwa jengo imenihuzunisha sana. Nimeridhishwa sana na juhudi za Jeshi letu na wananchi katika uokoaji.
#HotubaMachi31 Narudia kutoa pole kwa wote walioathirika na ajali hii. Tuwe na moyo wa subira tukiungana kuwaombea waliopoteza maisha.
#HotubaMachi31 Shukrani kwa uongozi wa mkoa, wilaya, Polisi, JWTZ, Hospitali ya Taifa Muhimbili na wote walioshiriki kwa namna mbalimbali.
#HotubaMachi31 Uchunguzi wa sababu za kuporomoka kwa jengo hilo ufanyike na wahusika wote washtakiwe na kuwajibishwa kwa mujibu wa sheria.
#HotubaMachi31 Nyaraka na kauli kali za kushutumiana zinazotolewa na viongozi wa dini za Kikristo na Kiislamu si jambo jema kwa nchi yetu.
#HotubaMachi31 Wakristo wanasema mihadhara ya kudhalilisha dini yao inaendeshwa na Waislamu na serikali haichukui hatua yoyote.
#HotubaMachi31 Waislamu wanasema Kitabu chao Kitakatifu kinadhalillishwa, wananyimwa fursa na kwamba serikali inapendelea Wakristo.
#HotubaMachi31 Binafsi nashutumiwa kupenda kuhudhuria shughuli za Wakristo zaidi mfano misiba na harambee kuliko za Waislamu.
#HotubaMachi31 Napenda kurudia tena kwamba mimi na Serikali ninayoiongoza HATUPENDELEI UPANDE WOWOTE na tunalihudumia Taifa kwa usawa.
#HotubaMachi31 Serikali haijashindwa kulinda raia wake na mali zao na si sahihi kutumia matukio machache kama kielelezo cha kushindwa.
#HotubaMachi31 Hakuna ushahidi wa uwepo wa kikundi chochote cha Kiislamu kinachopanga kuchoma moto makanisa wala kuua viongozi wa Kikristo.
#HotubaMachi31 Nasisitiza umuhimu wa viongozi wa dini zetu mbili kukutana mara kwa mara kuzungumzia mambo haya.
#HotubaMachi31 Mwisho natoa wito kwa waandishi wa habari wasaidie kuliepusha Taifa na chuki za kidini kwa kuacha ushabiki wa yanayotokea.
#HotubaMachi31 Waandishi wapime athari za taarifa zao kabla ya kuziandika na kuzichapisha na wawe makini na maneno wanayotumia.
#HotubaMachi31 Wamiliki wa vyombo vya habari watambue kwamba ni wajibu wao kuhakikisha vyombo vyao havitumiki kuibomoa jamii bali kuijenga.
#HotubaMachi31 Serikali itaendelea kuhakikisha ulinzi na  usalama wa raia wake na mali zao kama inavyofanya siku zote. Aksanteni sana.

Speaking of the Telecommunications Law, although CONATEL has awarded 322 licenses for TV, 132 are concentrated in the hands of 4 groups.
This represents almost 50% of the total licenses granted.
In this and other types of media concentrations are used to make unfair competition to other companies and put pressure on governments.
All to obtain many special benefits or tax exemptions. This has allowed them to amass fortunes to the detriment of the people.
This is what they defend. The government is not against freedom of expression.
